name: meteor-mash
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 20% chance to raise the user's Attack one stage.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Fires a meteor-like punch.
May raise ATTACK.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Fires a meteor-like punch.
May raise ATTACK.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
The foe is hit with
a hard, fast punch.
It may also raise
the user’s ATTACK.
